Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to extensions of state and local deadlines following a state disaster emergency
Summary: Relates to extensions of state and local deadlines following a state disaster emergency; adds school district to the list of municipality and district corporations; relates to the prerequisites, time and scope thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 15 of the laws of 1998 authorizing the extension of time for the collection of taxes, fines and payment of other moneys owed to government agencies and extending the deadline for filing of applications, reports or other requirements to government agencies or programs as a result of state disaster emergencies, in relation to the prerequisites, time and scope thereof
